content:
I have prepared a draft PR for the statement of the main results in the paper here: fpvandoorn/carleson#535
Let us use this thread to have an easier time discussing what should be in there or not.

From the PR:

Before putting more work into cleaning it up and a nice exposition, it would be nice to know if we are on the same page for what the 'main results' actually are.

I took it to mean:

  • metric space Carleson
  • linearised variant
  • two-sided variant

and also included:

  • classical Carleson
  • the specific 'real Carleson' instance used to make the derivation

In order to properly state everything I included a section with the definitions.

If anything else should be added, or something removed, please let me know.
